Okay, Patch, how many more of these men were chasing you?

Okay, Patch, how many more of these men were chasing you?
Three more!
Three more!
Three more!
Three more!
Did you ever consider just giving the treasure back?
Did you ever consider just giving the treasure back?
Did you ever consider just giving the treasure back?
Did you ever consider just giving the treasure back?
It is all hidden away. Safe, safe, safe...
It is all hidden away. Safe, safe, safe...
It is all hidden away. Safe, safe, safe...
It is all hidden away. Safe, safe, safe...
Well, the Selentine Emperor has been no friend to Agaria when we were in trouble, so I'm going to help you.
Well, the Selentine Emperor has been no friend to Agaria when we were in trouble, so I'm going to help you.
Well, the Selentine Emperor has been no friend to Agaria when we were in trouble, so I'm going to help you.

I will pay you! I WILL! A thousand Gold! More if you want!
I will pay you! I WILL! A thousand Gold! More if you want!
I will pay you! I WILL! A thousand Gold! More if you want!
I will pay you! I WILL! A thousand Gold! More if you want!
We'll settle it when I get back. For now, I just need to find these three men.
